stories.definitionOfDone: • Data Collection: The system successfully transmits aggregated weather data to the Data Management System for at least 90% of test cases within a 2-hour window.
stories.description: The system must collect weather data so that accurate forecasts can be generated
stories.testCases:
Test: Verify that the system must collect weather data
Expected: Functionality works as specified in the user story
stories.title: Collect Weather Data

stories.definitionOfDone: • Satellite Communication: The system successfully transmits data to all wilderness weather stations via satellite at least 95% of the time, as measured by a minimum of 30 consecutive transmissions.
stories.description: The system must communicate with all wilderness weather stations via satellite so that system health can be monitored
stories.testCases:
Test: Verify that the system must communicate with all wilderness weather stations via satellite
Expected: Functionality works as specified in the user story
stories.title: Communicate All Wilderness Weather Stations

stories.definitionOfDone: • Battery Charging: The battery charging functionality is implemented correctly, ensuring that batteries are charged when possible and remaining within the safe operating range.
stories.description: The system must ensure that batteries are charged when possible so that the weather station remains self-contained
stories.testCases:
Test: Verify that the system must ensure that batteries are charged when possible
Expected: Functionality works as specified in the user story
stories.title: Ensure That Batteries Are Charged

stories.definitionOfDone: • Dynamic Reconfiguration: The dynamic reconfiguration feature allows for successful replacement of at least 80% of the software components without causing a system downtime, and all replaced components are thoroughly tested to ensure compatibility with the new version.
stories.description: The system must dynamically reconfigure parts of the software so that new versions can be implemented
stories.testCases:
Test: Verify that the system must dynamically reconfigure parts of the software
Expected: Functionality works as specified in the user story
stories.title: Dynamically Reconfigure Parts Of Software
